questions.question: You are a student with an A2 proficiency in English. Your class teacher will ask you a question. You should answer this question with the minimum of 60 words. Share a memory of a holiday. Where was it; who went; what happenedâ€¦?

answers.answer: One of my favorite holidays was in the beautiful Italian city of Venice. My family and I spent a week there during summer vacation. We explored the city's stunning canals and historic buildings, including St. Mark's Basilica and the Doge's Palace. One unforgettable moment was when we took a gondola ride at sunset, floating through the enchanting, romantic canals while the city lit up around us. It was truly magical.
